title: Chocolate, cardamom and hazelnut babka
description: Swirls of chocolate run through spiced dough – a great alternative to cake with a cuppa.For this recipe you will need a 900g/2lb loaf tin.
ingredients: 280g/10oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
60g/2¼oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
60g/2oz dark chocolate, chopped into small pieces
15g/½oz white chocolate, chopped into small pieces
